message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.LG 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper focuses on fog-radio network (FRAN) which is a type of network architecture. 
2. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper discusses distributed deployment of cloud-clone facilities at the network edge. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper formulates an optimization problem to jointly optimize computation offloading policies and caching decisions subject to stringent per-slot deadline constraints. 
4. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the predictable length of the task-input bits and proposes an algorithm under arbitrarily distributed prediction error. 
5. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a sliding-window based online algorithm which could potentially involve machine learning techniques.
